channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mongoose Page Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mongoose Page Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-4675|2024-08-03T01:48:39.832Z -- unknown -- mongoose%20page%20plugin
item.description: The Mongoose Page Plugin WordPress plugin before 1.9.0 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
